Connect with me on <a href="https://twitter.com/statistishdan">Twitter</a>, <a href="https://github.com/ddsjoberg">GitHub</a>, and <a href="https://linkedin.com/in/ddsjoberg/">LinkedIn</a>.

I am happy to answer _gtsummary_ and _ggsurvift_ questions, but please do __not__ email me with questions. 
It is best for the community if questions are asked and answered on a public forum.

Post to [stackoverflow.com](https://stackoverflow.com/), use the _gtsummary_ or  _ggsurvfit_ tag, and I will be notified of your post.
